entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain near midnight then to flurries overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
